ygData.subject: Re: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: Try the cross road of Butcherblok mountains..  There s couple of monsters you can try to kill and good exp for lv5+ (snake, skunks, globin..ect)..  If you got
ygData.messageBody:
Try the cross road of Butcherblok mountains.. There's couple of
monsters you can try to kill and good exp for lv5+ (snake, skunks,
globin..ect).. If you got team up, run to the guards beside the cross
road. But the easiest way is try to group with someone else, wizards
are fragile in the early lvs.. Hope this helps.

Caear, High Elve


> Empress wrote:
>
> hey everyone, i'm a level five high elf, and i'm really scared to
> leave the greater faydark, everytime i do, i get killed by something,
> but everthing where i'm fighting is green now!! All those stupid
> skeletons and rats and those big bees all team up on me, what should i
> do?
